channel.title: I Need Help Please
channel.description: well hi. i need help! i have my fully own server right. but i wanna make some codes like ::rares so phats and mask come in it when other type it. or ::noob and have like a wooden shield n shit ROFL. but anywayz if i can get some help that would be great :P[br][size=1]Posted at: November 24, 2006, 05:56:42 PM[/size][hr]any1

item.title: I Need Help Please
item.dc:creator: @GzNshadow GzNshadow
item.description:
@GzNshadow wrote:

well here is what i know if its a 317 or 474 and there are already commands like ::xrichie
or ::godswords or so on find them commands in your client java
they should say something like
if command.equals ignor.case (“xrichie”) && player rights= > 3;
p.additem 995, 2147000000;
something like that copy it and paste it below xrichie and change the xrichie in the copy one to rares
then on the p.additem change the 995 to the phat item id and the 2147000000 to 1
and add another p.additem after that one and do the same thing with different phat color item id
hope this helps lol
if you have any further questions add me at
rdwuestewald@hotmail.com
i do not read emails so i hope you have messenger

Read full topic
